name: Pokémon Emerald Epsilon
overview: Features: • Leaders with rematch. • Improved graphics. • System clock automatically changes with 5 times of day. • System clock and time of day changes depending on biome. • New sprites all renewed virtually. • New sprites include: tiles, trainers sprites, Pokemon sprites, summaries, and charts. • Sounds remastered. • Leaders have more pokemon, and are more difficult.
